pkgmetadata.longdescription: Strength Training Manual R-Language Functions // Strength training prescription using percent-based approach requires numerous computations and assumptions. 'STMr' package allow users to estimate individual reps-max relationships, implement various progression tables, and create numerous set and rep schemes. The 'STMr' package is originally created as a tool to help writing Jovanovi M. (2020) Strength Training Manual ISBN:979-8604459898.
